item.title: Structuring Open Silicon - A TAC Perspective with Aaron Cunningham
item.description: How a globally distributed program manager is helping define the next phase of open source silicon collaboration. Introduction Aaron Cunningham serves as Chair of the CHIPS Alliance Technical Advisory Council (TAC) and is a Technical Program Manager at Google focused on tooling, architecture, and hardware optimization. From managing infrastructure in Singapore to advocating for cross-project clarity at the Linux Foundation, Aaron brings a uniquely strategic lens to the complexities of scaling open source silicon.
